name: Super Space Invaders (Vivid3D Tech Demo)
description:
Super Space Invaders is a 3D take on the classic Space Invaders, made 100% using Vivid3D - A modern 3D game engine and toolset we are developing.

This release is just the game super space invaders, pre-compiled and ready to run.

This has been updated to Version 2- which changes some sound effects.
